ZDO_UserDescConfResp_t Struct Reference

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a User_Desc_set directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the User_Desc_set command. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address of the user descriptor setting request.

Detailed Description

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a User_Desc_set directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the User_Desc_set command.

Definition at line 901 of file zdo.h.
